ygData.subject: RE: Fuah!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: How to make pie tin, appreciate power-training guide again, hehe. Anyone can recommend a PROFITABLE way to train for a skill 95 smith?  I m going FP b4 Friday
ygData.messageBody:
How to make pie tin, appreciate power-training guide again, hehe.

Anyone can recommend a PROFITABLE way to train for a skill 95 smith? I'm
going FP b4 Friday to con't my smithing training, all sponsorship welcome
;)

Ziltus.



On Saturday, 24 July, 1999 8:09 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
wrote:
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> The following updates have been made to the Test Server.
>
> - The Plane of Fear population has been fully revamped with new NPCs and
items.
> *****- Pottery has been enhanced, such that the profitability of certain
items has
> been altered.*****
> - The ability to make poison has been activated, in addition, a number of
components
> required for the Make Poison skill has been placed.
> - Though, the Test Server will be patched again on Saturday (tomorrow) to
complete
> the first installment of Make Poison changes.
> - A number of quests have been both enhanced and added.
> - The ability to report player whom are harassing has been implemented.
This is done
> by typing "/report" - the previous 10 lines of text will be saved to the
server for
> Customer Support representatives to review. This command may only be
performed once
> while on-line, you must then log out and back in to use it again.
>
> Everyone, start making those damn pie tins NOW!!!!
>
>
